languages.text: "Ты описываешь не воительницу, а придворную даму! Что это вообще за опись такая?"
"You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"
languages.original_text: "Ты описываешь не воительницу, а придворную даму! Что это вообще за опись такая?"

traits.locale_text: "You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this inventory, anyway?"
"You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this inventory, anyway?"
"You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this inventory, anyway?"
"You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this inventory, anyway?"
"You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"
"You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"

languages.text: «¡Está inventándose una dama de la corte en lugar de la guerrera que tiene ante los ojos! ¿Qué este supuesto inventario?».
languages.original_text: "You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Está inventándose una dama de la corte en lugar de la guerrera que tiene ante los ojos! ¿Qué este supuesto inventario?».

languages.text: “你说的是宫廷里的贵妇，不是站在你面前的勇士！这到底算是哪门子清单？”
languages.original_text: "You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"

traits.locale_text: “你说的是宫廷里的贵妇，不是站在你面前的勇士！这到底算是哪门子清单？”

languages.text: 「目の前の戦士の代わりに、なんか宮廷の貴婦人を作り上げてるんじゃないか！これが所謂インベントリというものなのか？」
languages.original_text: "You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"

traits.locale_text: 「目の前の戦士の代わりに、なんか宮廷の貴婦人を作り上げてるんじゃないか！これが所謂インベントリというものなのか？」

languages.text: « Vous inventez de toutes pièces le portrait d'une noble dame de la cour au lieu de décrire fidèlement la guerrière que vous avez sous les yeux ! C'est ça que vous appelez un inventaire ? »
languages.original_text: "You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous inventez de toutes pièces le portrait d'une noble dame de la cour au lieu de décrire fidèlement la guerrière que vous avez sous les yeux ! C'est ça que vous appelez un inventaire ? »

languages.text: "Gördüğün savaşçı yerine saraylı bir hanımefendi uyduruyorsun! Bu sözüm ona envanter de neyin nesi?"
languages.original_text: "You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğün savaşçı yerine saraylı bir hanımefendi uyduruyorsun! Bu sözüm ona envanter de neyin nesi?"

languages.text: "Ihr beschreibt eine Hofdame anstelle der Kriegerin, die vor Euch steht. Was soll diese so genannte Inventur?"
languages.original_text: "You are inventing some lady of the court in the place of the warrior you are looking at! What is this so-called inventory?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr beschreibt eine Hofdame anstelle der Kriegerin, die vor Euch steht. Was soll diese so genannte Inventur?"
